full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS PA BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYIS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B ('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS PA BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYIS PA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, CHE RIGS PA NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA BSTAN SRING KYI RIGS PA DANG LDAN PA, KUN RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO RTZIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU DAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJES BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG, ,NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG @018A *, ,PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,NYON MONGS KYI BRAN TU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, ,SA SKYA PAn CHEN LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, ,DE YIS BSTAN PO RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS, ,PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
